title: "Data Visualization Porject"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("output.csv")
data$x <- NULL
```

```{r}
subset(data, year == "1996")
```


```{r}

data$year <- factor(data$year)
data$emirate <- factor(data$emirate)
data$class <- factor(data$class)
data$nationality <- factor(data$nationality)
data$guests <- as.numeric(data$guests)
data$nights <- as.numeric(data$guests)

summary(data$nights)
data.io <- data %>%
  summarise(total_g = sum(guests))

data.io
subset(data, year == 1996)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(year, guests, fill=emirate)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~nationality)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(year, nights, fill=class)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~nationality)
```

```{r}
ggplot(subset(data, emirate=="abu dhabi"), aes(year, nights, fill=class)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~nationality)
```

```{r}
ggplot(subset(data, emirate=="abu dhabi" & 
                nationality == "U. A. E"), aes(year, nights, fill=class)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~nationality)
```

```{r}
ggplot(subset(data, emirate=="dubai" & 
                nationality == "Britan"), aes(year, nights, fill=class)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~nationality)
```
